languages.text: {n}Весело оскалившись, гигант вкрадчиво осведомляется:{/n} "А ты как думаешь?"
{n}The giant Space Marine grins, baring his teeth, and enquires innocently,{/n} "Why do you think?"
languages.original_text: {n}Весело оскалившись, гигант вкрадчиво осведомляется:{/n} "А ты как думаешь?"

languages.text: {n}这位壮硕的星际战士咧开嘴，露出了牙齿，无辜地问道。{/n}“那你认为是什么原因呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}The giant Space Marine grins, baring his teeth, and enquires innocently,{/n} "Why do you think?"

traits.locale_text: {n}这位壮硕的星际战士咧开嘴，露出了牙齿，无辜地问道。{/n}“那你认为是什么原因呢？”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}El gigantesco Marine Espacial sonríe, enseñando los dientes, y pregunta inocentemente:{/n} «¿Por qué cree que lo hago?».
languages.original_text: {n}The giant Space Marine grins, baring his teeth, and enquires innocently,{/n} "Why do you think?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El gigantesco Marine Espacial sonríe, enseñando los dientes, y pregunta inocentemente:{/n} «¿Por qué cree que lo hago?».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}巨大なスペースマリーンは歯をむき出しにしてニヤリと笑い、無邪気そうに尋ねる{/n}「なぜそう思う？」
languages.original_text: {n}The giant Space Marine grins, baring his teeth, and enquires innocently,{/n} "Why do you think?"

traits.locale_text: {n}巨大なスペースマリーンは歯をむき出しにしてニヤリと笑い、無邪気そうに尋ねる{/n}「なぜそう思う？」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der riesige Space Marine grinst und fragt unschuldig:{/n} "Warum glaubt Ihr wohl?"
languages.original_text: {n}The giant Space Marine grins, baring his teeth, and enquires innocently,{/n} "Why do you think?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der riesige Space Marine grinst und fragt unschuldig:{/n} "Warum glaubt Ihr wohl?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le gigantesque Space Marine sourit de toutes ses dents, et demande d'un air innocent :{/n} « Oui, pourquoi, à votre avis ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The giant Space Marine grins, baring his teeth, and enquires innocently,{/n} "Why do you think?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gigantesque Space Marine sourit de toutes ses dents, et demande d'un air innocent :{/n} « Oui, pourquoi, à votre avis ? »

languages.original_text: {n}The giant Space Marine grins, baring his teeth, and enquires innocently,{/n} "Why do you think?"

languages.text: {n}Devasa Uzay Piyadesi sırıtıyor, dişlerini göstererek masumca soruyor.{/n} "Sence neden?"
languages.original_text: {n}The giant Space Marine grins, baring his teeth, and enquires innocently,{/n} "Why do you think?"
